member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.Properties.Resources.SumatraPDFControl
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.Properties.Resources.SumatraPDFControlMini
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: T:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl
member.summary: Windows Forms Control which embeds modifed version of SumatraPDF to read and view Portable Document Files (PDF)
member.remarks: This control allows you to open and read PDF files with most features present in great SumatraPDF reader (https://www.sumatrapdfreader.org/). It requires an specific compiled Sumatra code version (https://github.com/marcoscmonteiro/sumatrapdf) which enables SumatraPDF working in an enhanced plugin mode. It's forked from original SumatraPDF code (https://github.com/sumatrapdfreader/sumatrapdf)

member.name: M:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)
member.summary: Processes Windows Messages.
member.remarks: This method has many customizations in order to process SumatraPDF messages. So, if there is need to override, remember to call base.WndProc.

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.BackgroundImage
member.summary: SumatraPDF logo

member.summary: Dual page display not continuous

member.summary: Single page display in continuous mode

member.summary: Dual page display in continuous mode

member.summary: Dual page display in continuous mode

member.summary: Document zoom mode to automatically adjust real zoom

member.summary: Default display mode: 100% page size

member.summary: Occurs after changing display mode.

member.summary: Occurs after changing document scroll position (vertical and/or horizontal).

member.name: E:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.KeyPress
member.summary: Occurs when a character, space or backspace key is pressed while the control has focus.

member.name: E:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.KeyDown
member.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

member.name: E:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.KeyUp
member.summary: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.ContextMenuStrip
member.summary: Gets or sets the ContextMenuStrip associated with this control.
member.remarks: The ContextMenuStrip for this control, or null if there is no ContextMenuStrip. The default is null.

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.SumatraPDFPath
member.summary: Path where SumatraPDF executable is present. If not informed assumes same SumatraPDFControl.dll directory

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.SumatraPDFExe
member.summary: SumatraPDF executable file name. Usually SumatraPDF.exe (default) or SumatraPDF-dll.exe

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.ScrollState
member.summary: Get or set current PDF scroll state (X and Y units from visible PDF page)

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.Zoom
member.summary: Get or set current numeric PDF zoom scale. See ZoomVirtual property to get or set zoom mode like fit width, fit page etc

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.ZoomVirtual
member.summary: Get or set currrent PDF virtual zoom mode (Fit width, Fit Page, Fit Content or None). See Zoom property to get or set numeric scale

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.DisplayMode
member.summary: Get or set mode to display PDF pages (SinglePage, Facing, BookView, Continuous, ContinuousFacing, ContinuousBookView, Automatic)

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.Page
member.summary: Get or set current PDF page viewing position

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.Rotation
member.summary: Get current PDF rotation (see RotateBy method to change rotation state)

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.NamedDest
member.summary: Get or set current PDF NamedDest viewing position

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.ToolBarVisible
member.summary: Get or set if SumatraPDF default toolbar is visible

member.name: P:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.TocVisible
member.summary: Get or set if SumatraPDF Table of contents (Toc) sidebar is visible (if document doesn't have Toc it always will be false)

member.name: M:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: M:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.LoadFile(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load sumatra supported file. Current file will be closed.
member.param: Open a new SumatraPDF instance (other executable process)
member.remarks: In case of multiple instances of SumatraPDFControl indicates if an pre-existing instance will be used or not. If true new SumatraPDF executable will be started. The default is false.

member.name: M:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.CopySelection
member.summary: Copy to clipboard current window text selection

member.name: M:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.TextSearch(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Do a text search on document from beginning

member.name: M:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.TextSearchNext(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Do a text search on document after a first search by
member.param: True (default) if serching forward, false if backwards

member.name: M:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.OpenPrintDialog
member.summary: Show dialog to print current document (in background)
member.remarks: After proceeding with print it occurs in background and SumatraPDF shows an interface to cancel the whole process. The following only applies for printing as image: Creates a new dummy page for each page with a large zoom factor, and then uses StretchDIBits to copy this to the printer's dc.

member.name: M:SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.RotateBy(SumatraPDF.SumatraPDFControl.RotationEnum)
member.summary: Rotate current document

member.summary: Variável de designer necessária.

member.summary: Cleaning resources being used
member.param: true if necessary to dispose managed resources.

member.summary: Método necessário para suporte ao Designer - não modifique o conteúdo deste método com o editor de código.
